High level overview



BrandAlytics is formed by merging Brand and Analytics. 



Functions
	User 
		Defines a set of brands. Brands can be Company names, Product names, Movie Personalities, or any set of keywords.
		Defines filter criterion for the brand. 
			Filter criterion can be 
				Web Sites or Blogs to monitor
				Country to look out for 
				Language to look in.
		Defines the settings to use for querying the google custom search engine.

	App
		Schedules daily collection of data based upon user definitions using scripted inputs.
		Collects data by querying Google Custom Search Engine. 
		Puts the collected data into Splunk by writing data into a new custom index.
		Uses Javascript SDK to provide insights into the brands.
 
	


Usage 

      

	  

	  1. Define brands and Specify other filter criteria.


			App>BrandAlytics>Brand>Define




2. Verify the definitions.


	App>BrandAlytics>Brand>Definitions



	
3. Modify Settings 

	App>BrandAlytics>Brand>Settings


 More details about Settings available in Help>FAQ.



	
4. Check Analytics tab on a daily basis to observe the latest trends and check Brand performance.


	App>BrandAlytics>Analytics
